sqlMap.select: select PROCESSMODELID, FLOW_ID, OPNINION_CONTENT, TJGJJSJ, GJJZXSPSJ, TASKNAME from T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELEIGTH where PROCESSMODELID = #processModelId:DECIMAL#

select PROCESSMODELID, FLOW_ID, OPNINION_CONTENT, TJGJJSJ, GJJZXSPSJ, TASKNAME from T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELEIGTH where
PROCESSMODELID = #processModelId:DECIMAL#
FLOW_ID = #flow_id:VARCHAR#
OPNINION_CONTENT = #opninion_content:VARCHAR#
TJGJJSJ = #tjgjjsj:VARCHAR#
GJJZXSPSJ = #gjjzxspsj:VARCHAR#
TASKNAME = #taskName:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELEIGTH (PROCESSMODELID, FLOW_ID, OPNINION_CONTENT, TJGJJSJ, GJJZXSPSJ, TASKNAME) values (#processModelId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #flow_id:VARCHAR#, #opninion_content:VARCHAR#, #tjgjjsj:VARCHAR#, #gjjzxspsj:VARCHAR#, #taskName:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELEIGTH set FLOW_ID = #flow_id:VARCHAR#, OPNINION_CONTENT = #opninion_content:VARCHAR#, TJGJJSJ = #tjgjjsj:VARCHAR#, GJJZXSPSJ = #gjjzxspsj:VARCHAR#, TASKNAME = #taskName:VARCHAR# where PROCESSMODELID = #processModelId:DECIMAL#
